short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export email and phone from group posts in facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This dedicated extension serves the purpose of seamlessly exporting crucial contact information, including emails and phone numbers, from posts within a Facebook group. Tailored to meet the needs of the sales staff, it streamlines and automates the process of collecting valuable customer data. By leveraging this tool, the sales team can operate more efficiently, significantly reducing the time and effort traditionally required for such tasks. This not only enhances the overall productivity of the team but also contributes to a more streamlined and effective customer information management system.
